analysis.description:
Reentrancy in EnjinBuyer.personal_withdraw (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/36645.sol#43-67):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/36645.sol#58)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(eth_to_withdraw_after_buy) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/36645.sol#47)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/36645.sol#62)

Reentrancy in EnjinBuyer.withdraw (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/36645.sol#69-95):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/36645.sol#86)
	External calls sending eth:
	- user.transfer(eth_to_withdraw_after_buy) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/36645.sol#76)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/36645.sol#90)

EnjinBuyer.purchase_tokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/36645.sol#97-106) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(this.balance == 0)
